title: Learning about flowers and their seeds. - 2nd ed.
brief_description: Uses time-lapse photography and animation to illustrate the biological functions of flowers and their seeds, the reproduction cycle, from seed to plant, to flower and back to seed. Demonstrates their contribution to the food supply.
